org.grobid.core.engines

Class ProcessEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grobid.core.engines.ProcessEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ProcessEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Perform the batch processing for the different engine methods.

      • createTrainingBlank

        public void createTrainingBlank(GrobidMainArgs pGbdArgs)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate blank training data from provided directory of PDF documents, i.e. where TEI files are text only without tags. This can be used to start from scratch any new model.
        Parameters:
        pGbdArgs - The parameters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
